Name: Pillazon: MMO Drug Lord Tycoon
About the game: Pillazon is a company management simulation game. Your job is to be a CEO who is eager to grow your small company. With a small investment, you'll build a great website to compete with other players in hopes of building the most valuable drug empire in history. Website Management Your success depends on your website. So, ensure you have enough servers and max your features' levels as soon as possible. Employee Management Your employees are the key part of your success. As you grow, you need to keep hiring more people. Your employees may lose morale over time, make the necessary expenses to prevent this, and make bonus payments to them if necessary. Office Management You have to rent more offices in order to hire more employees. There are many different kinds of office space, choose what you need. Decorate and make the necessary expenses to increase your employees' morale. Server Management You have to rent the most effective servers to run smoothly your website, otherwise, you will start losing users. Be aware of overload on servers to prevent this. Risk & Finance Management Sell or buy bitcoins at real-life prices to manage your finance. Make investments to clean your money otherwise, police will arrest your employees and close your properties. Be careful, other players can do research and find your investments to sabotage them with help of the mob. Level up your investments as much as possible to prevent them from being sabotaged. Rank Management | Zone fights Capture zones as much as possible, more zone means more rank up. Ranks will get you different benefits such as; More office capacity Speed buff for Employee Point Producing PvP Do DDoS attacks with your Attack(Hack) points, and defend your website with Defence points. Do Research about of target player's investments to sabotage it with the mob. DDoS attacks Sabotage investments Zone fights Zone Capturing The first order of transportation to a zone will start a battle for that zone. The battle will conclude after 24 hours. Meanwhile, players are able to send more troops. At the end of the battle time, the player who has more troops in the zone captures the zone.
